data.text: Terrible things will happen to you people in Jerusalem who are not worried about anything,
But go to Calneh city and see what happened there.
You are trying to not think about a day when you will experience disasters,
You lie on beds decorated with expensive ivory,
You drink entire bowlfuls of wine
Your feasting and lounging on soft couches will soon end,
Yahweh the Lord has solemnly declared this:
When that happens, if there are ten people in one house, they will all die.

If a relative who ◄has the task of/is responsible for► burning their corpses comes to the house and inquires of anyone who is still hiding there, “Is there anyone here with you?”, and that person replies “No,” the one who inquired will say, “Be quiet! We must not mention the name of Yahweh, lest he cause us also to be killed!”
Terrible things like that will happen because Yahweh has commanded that large houses in Israel must be smashed into pieces,
Horses certainly do not [RHQ] run on big rocks,
You are proud because you have captured Lo-Debar town,
But the Commander of the armies of angels declares,
